sentence.Network_en: After the ceremony a marriage is a fait accompli.
sentence.Network_cn: 婚礼后,婚姻便是既成事实了.

sentence.Network_en: They became increasingly annoyed that they were being presented with a fait accompli.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们得知时已是木已成舟，无法变更了，他们为此越来越恼火。

sentence.Network_en: We got married secretly and then presented our parents with a fait accompli.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们是秘密结婚的,事后才告诉父母.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Once determined , on a accompli ., 一旦下定决心 , 就成事实.
Liu Fuyuan , in a set of new conditions accompli policy ., 刘福垣建议 , 在既成事实的条件下制定一套新的政策.

list.abs: 什么意思... ... A Fait Accompli 既成事实 accept a fait accompli 承认既成事实 But Also Accompli 还可以讲价.
fear it has been a fait accompli怕已即成事实了
once determined , on a fait accompli .一旦下定决心，就成事实。
至于政府宣传，则以既定事实（fait accompli）为本，将胶袋徵费讲成铁律，市民只得迁就。如环保署的广告说「用少一个，悭五毫」…
1994 Film List | Chinese Movie Database ... Ermo 二嫫 Fait Accompli 爱的种子 Family Affairs 清官难审.

auth_sentence.content: Given that we were presented with a fait accompli our whole objective was to minimise the damage.
auth_sentence.res_content: Given that we were presented with a fait accompli our whole objective was to minimise the damage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Given that we were presented with a fait accompli our whole objective was to minimise the damage.

auth_sentence.content: When all is seen as a here now fait accompli, the question of free will is rendered moot.
auth_sentence.res_content: When all is seen as a here now fait accompli, the question of free will is rendered moot.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When all is seen as a here now fait accompli, the question of free will is rendered moot.

auth_sentence.content: Other members favor making marginal improvements to a faulty bill, on the theory that it's a fait accompli anyway.
